name: Looping Tape
description:
PLAY IN FULLSCREEN

Looping Tape is a puzzle game made for the Mini Jame Gam 16, which features Duct Tape as a prominent resource.

Walkthrough:

L1 - Enter the door to your right.

L2 - Create a trampoline between the two poles and jump up to the door.

L3 - Walk to the far right and you will find the door.

L4 - Enter the room to your left, create a trampoline and collect the key at the top. Use that key to unlock the door to the right of spawn.

L5 - Click on the door to gain control of it and navigate it to your character.

L6 - Quickly create a trampoline to block the door from drifting away and then enter it.

L7 - Enter the door to your left, in the hole is a key, use that key to advance to the next level.

L8 - Avoid the lights and make it to the door on your right.

L9 - Enter the door to your right.

L10 - Use the trampolines to hit the red ghost 6 times to beat the game.

S1 - The door is out of map to the right of you.

S2 - Create a trampoline and leave the playspace via the top right.

S3 - Click anywhere and the door will appear at that location.

S4 - The lock is fake, just enter the door.

S5 - Click on the door to control it, push the key to the player, push the player to the top left.

S6 - The door is fake, walk left to find the real door.

S7 - Same as L7, but upside down.

S8 - Wait until the win screen shows up.
